Description: Check if condotel is available for selected check-in and check-out dates
Pre-Condition: User must be logged in as Tenant role. Condotel exists in database

Description: Create a new booking for a condotel with selected dates
Pre-Condition: User must be logged in as Tenant role. Condotel is available for selected dates

Description: Get list of all bookings for logged-in tenant
Pre-Condition: User must be logged in as Tenant role. Multiple bookings exist for tenant

Description: Get booking details by booking ID
Pre-Condition: Booking exists and belongs to logged-in tenant

Description: Cancel an existing booking
Pre-Condition: Pending or Confirmed booking exists and belongs to logged-in tenant

Description: Browse and view list of available condotels
Pre-Condition: Application is running. Condotels exist in database

Description: Filter condotels by price range, location, or other criteria
Pre-Condition: Condotels with different attributes exist in database

Description: Search condotels by name or keywords
Pre-Condition: Condotels with different names exist in database

Description: View detailed information of a specific condotel
Pre-Condition: Condotel exists in database with complete information

Description: Review booking summary and proceed to payment on checkout page
Pre-Condition: User is logged in as Tenant. Booking data is passed to checkout page

Description: Create payment link for a pending booking
Pre-Condition: Pending booking exists. User is logged in as Tenant

Description: Get payment status for a booking
Pre-Condition: Payment link exists for booking. User is logged in

Description: Handle PayOS payment return callback after payment completion
Pre-Condition: Payment is initiated on PayOS

Description: Display payment page with payment link and QR code
Pre-Condition: Booking is created. Payment link is generated

Description: Display success page after successful payment
Pre-Condition: Payment is completed successfully on PayOS

Description: Display cancel page after payment is cancelled
Pre-Condition: User cancels payment on PayOS page

Description: Check payment status from booking history page
Pre-Condition: Booking with payment link exists. User is logged in

Description: Request refund for a booking
Pre-Condition: Booking exists and is eligible for refund. User is logged in as Tenant

Description: Get list of refund requests (Admin view)
Pre-Condition: User must be logged in as Admin role. Multiple refund requests exist in system

Description: Admin confirms and processes a refund request
Pre-Condition: Pending refund request exists. User is logged in as Admin

Description: Display refund request page with booking information and bank form
Pre-Condition: Booking exists and is eligible for refund. User is logged in as Tenant

Description: View refund policy page with terms and conditions
Pre-Condition: Refund policy page exists and is accessible

Description: Get list of available service packages for purchase
Pre-Condition: User must be logged in as Host role. Service packages may exist in system

Description: Get current active package information for logged-in host
Pre-Condition: User must be logged in as Host role. Active HostPackage may exist for host

Description: Purchase a service package for host account
Pre-Condition: User must be logged in as Host role. Package exists in system

Description: Create a new condotel (subject to package limits)
Pre-Condition: User is logged in as Host role. Host has active service package

Description: Get list of pending payouts for admin to process
Pre-Condition: User must be logged in as Admin role. Completed booking >= 15 days ago with IsPaidToHost = false exists

Description: Process payout for a single booking to host
Pre-Condition: Wallet exists for host. Completed booking >= 15 days ago with IsPaidToHost = false exists. User is logged in as Admin

Description: Get list of paid payouts (history)
Pre-Condition: Paid booking (IsPaidToHost = true) exists in system. User is logged in as Admin

Description: Process all eligible payouts at once
Pre-Condition: Multiple eligible bookings exist in system. User is logged in as Admin. Hosts have wallets

Description: Create a review for a completed booking
Pre-Condition: Completed booking exists. No existing review for this booking. User is logged in as Tenant

Description: Get list of all reviews created by logged-in tenant
Pre-Condition: Multiple reviews exist for logged-in tenant. User is logged in as Tenant

Description: Update an existing review (within 7 days)
Pre-Condition: Review created < 7 days ago exists and belongs to logged-in tenant. User is logged in as Tenant

Description: Get list of reviews for host's condotels
Pre-Condition: Multiple reviews exist for host's condotels. User is logged in as Host role

Description: Display write review page with booking information and review form
Pre-Condition: Booking exists with status "Completed". User is logged in as Tenant

Description: Display my reviews page with list of user's reviews
Pre-Condition: Multiple reviews exist for logged-in tenant. User is logged in as Tenant

Description: Host replies to a tenant review
Pre-Condition: Review exists for host's condotel. User is logged in as Host role
